query:
SELECT v.id as venda_id, 
       v.formandoId, 
       v.excluido,
       DATE_FORMAT(v.dataVenda, '%d/%m/%Y') as data_venda,
       v.valorTotal / 100 as valor_bruto,
       f.id as formando_id,
       f.nome as formando_nome, 
       f.turmaId,
       t.codigo as turma_codigo
FROM vendas v 
LEFT JOIN formandos f ON v.formandoId = f.id 
LEFT JOIN turmas t ON f.turmaId = t.id
WHERE DATE(v.dataVenda) = '2026-06-15'
ORDER BY v.id
